body:
```
nvim -u NORC

:lua require('telescope.builtin').find_files()
```

I built neovim w/ these flags

`rm -rf build && CMAKE_EXTRA_FLAGS="-DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=clang -DCLANG_ASAN_UBSAN=1" make`

### Actual behaviour

```
âžœ nvim

=================================================================
==1012202==ERROR: LeakSanitizer: detected memory leaks

Direct leak of 3040 byte(s) in 3 object(s) allocated from:
    #0 0x4d485d in malloc (/usr/local/bin/nvim+0x4d485d)
    #1 0x113aa72 in try_malloc /home/tj/build/neovim/build/../src/nvim/memory.c:71:15
    #2 0x113ac4c in xmalloc /home/tj/build/neovim/build/../src/nvim/memory.c:105:15

    #1 0x1ef0c6a in lj_vm_ffi_call (/usr/local/bin/nvim+0x1ef0c6a)
    #2 0x1f187a6 in lj_ccall_func /home/tj/build/neovim/.deps/build/src/luajit/src/lj_ccall.c:1161:5

Direct leak of 152 byte(s) in 1 object(s) allocated from:
    #0 0x4d485d in malloc (/usr/local/bin/nvim+0x4d485d)
    #1 0x1e9eb42 in luv_new_timer (/usr/local/bin/nvim+0x1e9eb42)

Direct leak of 136 byte(s) in 1 object(s) allocated from:
    #0 0x4d485d in malloc (/usr/local/bin/nvim+0x4d485d)
    #1 0x1e9dccb in luv_spawn (/usr/local/bin/nvim+0x1e9dccb)

Direct leak of 63 byte(s) in 1 object(s) allocated from:
    #0 0x4d485d in malloc (/usr/local/bin/nvim+0x4d485d)

    #2 0x113ac4c in xmalloc /home/tj/build/neovim/build/../src/nvim/memory.c:105:15

SUMMARY: AddressSanitizer: 773529 byte(s) leaked in 1543 allocation(s).
```

### Expected behaviour

Either I write better code (which might be the solution?) or maybe it's something here that's causing me to leak memory.

@bfredl

comment_data.body: note: we might be missing a full lua gc in free_all_mem, I will investigate.

milestone.description: Low priority items. We plan to work on this but don't have a target date.
milestone.title: backlog

title: nlua_regex Lua Memory Leak?
